Language.Text: [F]abricator Chamber
[D]rop Item in Pit
[D]rop this Item
Drop [A]nother %itemName%
"You have %number% left."
"You have none left."
What item do you wish to drop into the Teraton pit?
You are in the vast central chamber of the Teraton nest. A large pit in the center of the cavern is inhabited by a mass of tentacles, cilia, and grotesque organs.

Tentacles reach out to accept your offering and the organic mass swallows it with a hiss. Organs gurgle and glow for a while, and then tentacles pull a slimy mass out of some orifice and deposit it at your feet.
You see %itemName%.

Tentacles eagerly reach out to accept your offering and the organic mass swallows it with a hiss.
The organic mass spews a sweet, pleasant mist.

Tentacles reach out to accept your offering and the organic mass tentatively swallows it.
With a roar of anger, the organic mass spews a thick mist of bile. You are covered in a slimy broth of chemicals.

Tentacles reach out to accept your offering and the organic mass swallows it.
Organs and bladders gurgle as they process the %food% you have fed them.
Tentacles reach out to accept your offering, but after a tentative taste they discard it through one of the many tunnels along the wall of the pit.
Tentacles reach out to accept your offering, but after a tentative taste, they crush it and discard it through one of the many tunnels along the wall of the pit.

Angered by your offerings, the tentacles of the pit reach out to grab you. Before you can run, they slip around your neck and waist and pull you down into the pit.
You are dissolved by the various acids and enzymes of the grotesque organic mass.

Language.Text: [R]esearch Chamber

You enter a dim cavern filled with arcane equipment. Dozens of human subjects, wired, tubed, and in various stages of health and wholeness, lie on articulated beds. A tall Teraton with supernumerary fingers tends to the patients with a mixture of curiosity and concern.

Language.Text: [U]ndock
You are docked with a Teraton chrysalis—a pulsing mass of biomechanical systems. You see a bony structure taking shape inside the large spherical structure.
You are docked at the dead remains of a Teraton chrysalis. The bony, motionless mass at its center bleeds an ochre fluid.

Language.Text: [T]rading Chamber
You are in the peripheral tunnel of a Teraton nest. The hard walls are covered by a sinewy membrane and odd growths hang from the ceiling. There is a foul smell of rot and bile in the air.

The Trading Chamber is a vast, dark cavern where Teratons trade with various human and neo-humans. From a distance the Teratons look like abnormally tall humans, but up close you notice their deformities and mutations.
You are docked at the remains of a Teraton nest. The sickly sweet smell of burnt flesh fills the air and mucusy discharges flow out of organic walls.

Language.Text:
You try to enter the Trading Chamber but a group of Teratons grab you and drag you back to your ship. Snorting with contempt for your weak ship, they rummage through your cargo hold looking for valuable items.
They take %itemName% and leave you in pain on the deck of your ship.
